entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
